seed: "Elden Ring offers a vast, challenging world with rewarding exploration and combat. Best for fans of FromSoftware, but the difficulty and sparse story may not appeal to everyone."

seed: "The Witcher 3 is a must-play for story lovers, with an incredible world and quests, but bugs and clunky combat hold it back. Recommended for those who value narrative over gameplay polish."
